string.text:
A bolt-action rifle known for its exceptional durability, smooth action, and long-range accuracy. Designed for military service, it features a strong, reinforced receiver and a long barrel for improved ballistic performance. Despite its age, it remains a sought-after firearm for collectors and historical enthusiasts due to its reliability and craftsmanship.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Empire of Japan
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Empire of Japan
